basics.name: Yuyao Song
basics.label: Computational Biologist
basics.summary: Computational biologist with 6 years of experience in international, interdisciplinary academic research settings. Core expertise in analysing large-scale data in genomics and single-cell transcriptomics. Skilled in statistical data analysis, bioinformatics software and pipeline development, and applied algorithm design and machine learning. Proven track record of initiating, leading and completing scientific projects, translating scientific results into peer-reviewed publications, conference presentations and open-source software. Passionate about translating complex biological data into new knowledge and real-world applications.

work.name: European Bioinformatics Institute (EMBL-EBI)
work.summary: Develop computational methods for the cross-species comparison of single-cell RNA-seq data.
highlights: Designed and developed a scalable and reproducible Nextflow pipeline for cross-species integration benchmark
Developed a graph-based algorithm for cross-species cell type prediction on heterogeneous graphs
Consulting scientist for research groups and consortiums

volunteer.summary: Manage and conduct consulting projects for Cambridge-based biotech startups, including project scoping, team formation, project delivery and client communication.

courses: Mathematics, Molecular Biology, Genetics, Bioinformatics, Physics, Chemistry, Physology, Cell Biology, Immunology, Biochemistry, Biostatistics, Programming
Economics, Programming, Algorithms, Statistics, Accounting, Business Analytics, Management
Computational Biology, Machine Learning, Statistics, Bioinformatics, Programming, Data Science, Systems Biology, Genomics, Single-cell RNA-seq, Evolution, Cross-species comparison

awards.title: JXTX scholarship
awards.awarder: James P. Taylor Foundation for Open Science
awards.summary: Awardee of the JXTX scholarship for outstanding acadenic performance and exceptional contribution to open science. received full funding to attend the Biology of Genomes 2024 conference in CSHL.

awards.title: ECCB conference funding
awards.summary: Received funding to present research at the ISMB/ECCB 2025 conference in Liverpool, UK.

awards.title: POSCO Asia Fellowship and Comprehensive Excellence Award of Tsinghua University
awards.summary: Outstanding academic performance and all-round development award, awarded to top 1% of students in the school of life sciences.

awards.title: Freshmen Scholarship of Tsinghua University
awards.summary: Gold Medal in the National Olympiad contest in Biology, awarded the Freshmen Scholarship.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
